casebody.data:
STATE OF CONNECTICUT v. ROBERT D. THOMAS (14156)

Dupont, G. J., and Lavery and Freedman, Js.

Argued January 11 decision released February 13, 1996 Robert G. Golger, special public defender, for the appellant (defendant). Michele C. Lukban, deputy assistant state’s attorney, with whom, on the brief, were Donald A. Browne, state’s attorney, and Nicholas J. Bove, Jr., assistant state’s attorney, for the appellee (state). PER CURIAM.

The judgment is affirmed.
